Tammy started following the group into the forest, while keeping far enough distance to ensure they dont discover that they are being followed. However Jasmine knew, but knows nothing can come from it, as it was on a rare occasion where a human did stumble on the correct path to get to the clearing in the middle, but such instances it was dealt with immediatly, the dragon who spots him tends to ask him some questions of the current state of human society, and after they will clear their mind of the experience and send them back on their way into the forest with the human not remembering except for entering the forest in the first place.

As you should know the only reason why a dragon would choose a human, especially one of the opposite sex is that they do have a interest in becoming your mate. And trust me, Samara isnt easy to impress alot of men approached her tried and failed." Mike noticed Samara was blushing a little. Jake said"Men, you have humans living with you in the dragon realm" Jasmine looked at Jake and Replied"Yes, we do, when we put ourselves into self imposed exile, some humans who believed in the alliance with the dragons chose to come with us. To this day there are still human colonies living in the dragon realm, but thats enough with that its time to get to what we are here to do, to teach you 2 how to ride a dragon..." 1131312.content:
Jake said" I won't tell her, I think for now its best to keep it a secret." Drake looked at Jake and said" Are you sure? she will eventually need to find out as right now your body is already changing." Jake asked "Changing?" Drake replied back "You are becoming part dragon, those scales are just a small portion of those changes yet to come..." Drake paused looking at Jake then said" When the changes are finished you will be able to change your form to either a full dragon or a mixed form(human but with features of a dragon) or stay as you are now... however the first time change to a dragon will be a forced one... and there is no knowing when that will happen..."

Jake then said" Well if thats the case I will keep it a secret for now, but well i feel she still needs to know something.." Drake then looked back at him " Well you could introduce her to your mother as a normal human girl until you feel its time that she needs to know the truth" Drake then continued" As you see this mating with a human is a long process, and it is our tradition for the dragon to reside with the mate for 2 years in the human form before the mating is made official" Jake then looked at Jasmine and asked " Would that be okay with you Jasmine?" Jasmine nodded. Jake then looks back at Drake and asks " But what do we do about her having to reside with me?" Drake replied back " Correct me if im wrong but isn't your mom looking to rent out the extra room in your house?" Jake replied" Oh yea, I suppose that would work.but.." Drake interupted" there is nothing to worry about, we will give jasmine the necessary funds to keep paying your mom to rent out the room if that is what your worried about."

Drake now turning his attention towards mike.. then said" Mike, you being Jakes best friend due to this expect your life to change," Mike replied back "What would i be forced into being mated to a dragon?" Drake laughed then replied" No, well not unless you want to.. im sure there are other female dragons out there that will take up your offer should you desire it." Drake paused then continued" Mike because of your status with Jake you are already considered a friend amoungst all dragons, many dragons will fight to protect you if you ever need it, and you will be offered come the right time to become a dragon rider." Mike than said " Wow, im honored.." Drake replied "and so you should, most humans would have to prove their worth to become a dragon rider, while you get an open invitation to become one should the time come to require it"

Drake then looked down then looked back at Jake and said with a more serious tone.."Jake and Mike, I feel i need to be honest with you a little bit.. its partly due to why this is all happening now."

1132.content:
The principle comes out of his office to notice that Ted is chasing Jake. He goes in front of them, “What is going on here?” he says. Ted points at Jake, “This thief just stole my iPod!” Jake snares at him, “No I didn’t! You just wanted to beat me up!”

The funny thing is, Jake has an iPod in the left pocket of his backpack. It’s Jake’s iPod, but he never really brings it to school. Ted however, always brings his iPod to school. This is something the principle has known ever since Jake and Ted attended this school.

“Give me back my iPod!”
“This is my iPod!”
“Give it back to me you liar!”
“I’m not lying! This really is my iPod!”

Basically, that argument went on for two minutes, then when the principle was about to stop it, Mike comes in and stops the argument. “Ted… this is Jake’s iPod. Now shut up and leave him alone.” Ted isn’t giving up, “But that IS my iPod! I was looking all over for it! And now I know that he stole it from me! Give me my iPod you thief!”

Mike sighs, and he says smoothly, “Geez, you just won’t give it up will you? C’mon Jake, we ought to get to class.” Jake and mike leave the scene, while ted continues to complain about his false witness of the iPod.

Mike looks at Jake… with a surprised look. “Wow Jake!” he says, “no bruises this time? This is a first! Usually when I see you with Ted, there’s not a single spot on you that isn’t bruised!”

Jake laughs, “Well, let’s just say… I dodged for once. More like three times! It took me until now to realize that I shouldn’t let them beat me up anymore. You know, I should’ve thrown a few punches myself! I now feel like I’m no longer a weakling! From now on, it’s no more Mr. Wimpy guy!”

Mike smiles, “Well I’m glad you’re improving Jake. You know how I’m always telling you to stand up for yourself, and today’s the day you actually did. I’m proud of you.”

When school was over, Jake and Mike were both walking out of there… until Jasmine caught Mike’s eye…

But what seems so interesting about Jasmine that made Mike notice her?

info.brief_description: A human holds the key to a new alliance between humans and dragons.
info.description:
A long time ago humans used to fight along side dragons against a great evil, And now with the threat of it returning to the world, A dragon sets out to find a human male to mate with to bring about a new dragon-human alliance.

Characters:
Jake: A human male age 17, Only has 1 friend in high school, Often picked on by bullies, always tries to defend other people even though most attempts end up in him getting beat up. And always teased about the strange dreams he has.

Mike: Jake's only friend age 18 , often saves him from being beat up by the bullies,

Jasmine A female Red Dragon princess, very kind, Stong believer in a prophecy that fortells a new alliance between humans and dragons, and believes she will be the one to find the human... and as with all dragons she can take a human form

Ted A school bully who always picks on Jake

Tammy The schools head cheerleader, always picked on Jake, however due to a accident that nearly ended her life she realized that she has feelings for Jake, and is determined to make Jake her Boyfriend regardless of how futile it may be
Rules:

1. No killing of main characters(although can be brought close to death), new characters can be introduced and killed off as necessary
2. No One line chapters, Each chapter must at least contain a paragraph, I will permit a chapter merely for giving more choices provided you choose 1 of the choices yourself..
3. When the time comes for the mating it can be either willing or unwilling but if its unwilling it must be done in effort to save the persons life.. the process either willing or unwilling will end up giving josh the ability to transform into a dragon form at will
4. Mike can either know about jake's new role in the world or be unaware of it..
5. Story progression must be logical, for example, if a character at the end of the chapter decided to take a ride on a bus home, the next chapter should reflect that he was on the bus,
6. and have fun :)

I should also note that for the sake of the story the mating wont happen till after a couple chapters, and the first chapter will be in the past

I will randomly reward 150 points for good additions...
